title: Apple releases macOS Monterey 12.3 beta 2 for developers with Universal Control and more
content:
After launching the first macOS Monterey 12.3 beta to developers and public testers with the exciting Universal Control feature enabled at the end of January, the second beta has arrived today.

more…

The post Apple releases macOS Monterey 12.3 beta 2 for developers with Universal Control and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After launching the first macOS Monterey 12.3 beta to developers and public testers with the exciting Universal Control feature enabled at the end of January, the second beta has arrived today. The second macOS Monterey 12.3 beta is now rolling out via OTA for developers already enrolled in the beta as well as being available [â€¦]
